short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Know anyone’s personality, personalize each message, close every deal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Know your buyers, understand their personality, and personalize every interaction.

Humantic AI provides previously impossible buyer insights so that salespeople always know exactly what will clinch every deal. It helps them stand out in every interaction by combining the best of Generative AI and DISC Selling.

In your day-to-day sales, you can now::
➤ Predict your buyer’s DISC personality
➤ Personalize not just emails, but also calls and LinkedIn DMs in seconds
➤ Create Buying Committee Maps to skilfully navigate multiple stakeholders

Salesforce, Salesloft, Outreach, HubSpot or Linkedin - Humantic AI works seamlessly with your existing sales stack, as if it’s a native feature.

Key highlights:
➤ Average increase of 109% in pipeline and 16.2% in closed/won revenue
➤ Named by Gartner in its 2024 Revenue technology Hype Cycle
➤ Second most adopted Sales AI of 2023 and 2024 for North America as per G2. Only behind Salesforce!

From AWS to Sandler, Domo to Manchester United — the savviest sellers are adopting a buyer-first approach to selling.

Download the extension, try it for free and join the club!

Note: If you're migrating from Crystal Knows or XiQ, write to sales@humantic.ai for a smooth transition.
